body_html:
I updated to the Keras 2.2.0 (TF 1.8.0)

The above code exits the loop after iteration 3 (counter=3), with no error or warning or something like that, just it exists the loop!. Unbelievable.

Keras 2.1.6 does not have this specific problem.

body:
I updated to the Keras 2.2.0 (TF 1.8.0)

The above code exits the loop after iteration 3 (counter=3), with no error or warning or something like that, just it exists the loop!. Unbelievable. 

Keras 2.1.6 does not have this specific problem.
